verses.verse: That Which <S%G3739><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> The Beginning, <S%G746><s%> That Which <S%G3739><s%> We Have Heard, <S%G191><s%> That Which <S%G3739><s%> We Have Seen <S%G3708><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> With Our Eyes, <S%G2257><s%> That Which <S%G3739><s%> We Gazed Upon <S%G2300><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Handled <S%G5584><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life; <S%G2222><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Was Manifested, <S%G5319><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We Have Seen, <S%G3708><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bear Witness, <S%G3140><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Report <S%G518><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eternal, <S%G166><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Manifested <S%G5319><s%> To Us : <S%G2254><s%>

That Which <S%G3739><s%> We Have Seen <S%G3708><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Have Heard <S%G191><s%> We Report <S%G518><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Fellowship <S%G2842><s%> May Have <S%G2192><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Us; <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fellowship <S%G2842><s%> Indeed <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Our <S%G2251><s%> Is With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> His Son <S%G846><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> We Write <S%G1125><s%> , To You <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> May Be <S%G5600><s%> Full. <S%G4137><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Message <S%G1860><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> We Have Heard <S%G191><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Announce <S%G312><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Darkness <S%G4653><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2076><s%> Is Not Any At All. <S%G3762><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> We Should Say <S%G2036><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Fellowship <S%G2842><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> Should Walk, <S%G4043><s%> We Lie, <S%G5574><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Do Not Practise <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth. <S%G225><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> We Should Walk, <S%G4043><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light, <S%G5457><s%> Fellowship <S%G2842><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Cleanses <S%G2511><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Sin. <S%G266><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> We Should Say <S%G2036><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Have Not, <S%G2192><s%> Ourselves <S%G1438><s%> We Deceive, <S%G4105><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us. <S%G2254><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> We Should Confess <S%G3670><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Our Sins, <S%G2257><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Righteous, <S%G1342><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He May Forgive <S%G863><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sins, <S%G266><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Cleanse <S%G2511><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> From <S%G575><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Unrighteousness. <S%G93><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> We Should Say <S%G2036><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Have Not Sinned, <S%G264><s%> A Liar <S%G5583><s%> We Make <S%G4160><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us. <S%G2254><s%>
